responsibilities: Build deep learning and statistical models to provide end-to-end estimated time of arrival (ETA) prediction for e-commerce logistics.
Use data mining tools to build logistics network knowledge graphs and construct a situational awareness & early warning system for logistics fulfillment.
Analyze and predict the spatio-temporal trajectory sequence of express packages using deep learning, statistical inference, and other algorithmic methods.
Build a service network design (SND) model for the location selection of transshipment centers and last mile stations.
Extract the direction of logistics operation optimization, cost reduction, and service quality improvement by understanding supply chain and logistics scenarios.
Develop innovative and state-of-the-art e-commerce logistics models and algorithms.
skills: Ability to build and analyze deep learning models.
Skills in developing situational awareness systems.
Competence in service network design (SND) modeling.
qualifications: Ability to work in San Jose or Seattle offices.
